name: Exeggutor
description: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers.  In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check the foe’s held item.

abilities.name: Harvest
abilities.effect: After each turn, if the last item this Pokémon consumed was a Berry and it is not currently holding an item, it has a 50% chance of regaining that Berry, or a 100% chance during strong sunlight.
abilities.description: May create another Berry after one is used.
